I personally didnt like the GFI subscription model ( I assume this is hounddog you are referring?) - it gets pricy quite quickly, depending on what you are monitoring.

We use paessler network monitor - its a good system and very flexible, you can monitor just about anything that supports wmi, snmp etc. Quite a steep learning curve though and is positioned more towards the enterprise market than GFi. It has no reliance on a 3rd party service, which I value.

Richard
